attributes.additional_details:
Amy Winehouse is set to have a statue erected in her honor.

Why? She died of Alcohol Intoxication and was a prolific drug abuser for many years why should someone who has done these activities despite how good her voice is be depicted publicly its a bad influence.

http://www.mirror.co.uk/news/uk-news/amy-winehouse-statue-unveiled-near-4081998

rejection.details: For the local council to consider.
